trans-unit.source: Enables sharing of global information across multiple sessions and requests within an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Habilita o compartilhamento de informações globais em várias sessões e solicitações dentro de um aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: An ASP.NET application is the sum of all files, pages, handlers, modules, and code within the scope of a virtual directory and its subdirectories on a single Web server.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo ASP.NET é a soma de todos os arquivos, páginas, manipuladores, módulos e código dentro do escopo de um diretório virtual e seus subdiretórios em um único servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: A single instance of an HttpApplicationState class is created the first time a client requests any URL resource from within a particular ASP.NET application virtual directory.
trans-unit.target: Uma única instância de uma classe HttpApplicationState é criada na primeira vez que um cliente solicita qualquer recurso de URL de dentro de um diretório virtual do aplicativo ASP.NET específico.

trans-unit.source: A separate single instance is created for each ASP.NET application on a Web server.
trans-unit.target: Uma única instância separada é criada para cada aplicativo ASP.NET em um servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: A reference to each instance is then exposed via the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Application%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para cada instância, em seguida, é exposta por meio de intrínseca <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Application%2A>objeto.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Application%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application state is not shared across either a Web farm (in which an application is hosted across multiple servers) or a Web garden (in which an application is hosted across multiple processes on the same computer).
trans-unit.target: Estado do aplicativo não é compartilhado entre uma Web farm (em que um aplicativo está hospedado em vários servidores) ou um ambiente Web (em que um aplicativo está hospedado em vários processos no mesmo computador).

trans-unit.source: Adds a new object to the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um novo objeto para o <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The value of the object.
trans-unit.target: O valor do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access keys in the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as chaves de acesso a <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: A string array of <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object names.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de cadeia de caracteres de <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> nomes de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Removes all objects from an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os objetos de um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência para o <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This property provides compatibility with earlier versions of ASP.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece compatibilidade com versões anteriores do ASP.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência para o <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of objects in the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de objetos de <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of item objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de objetos de item na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object by numerical index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objeto por índice numérico.

trans-unit.source: The index of the application state object.
trans-unit.target: O índice do objeto de estado do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The object referenced by index.
trans-unit.target: O objeto referenciado por index .

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object by name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objeto pelo nome.

trans-unit.source: The following example returns an object named MyAppVar1 from the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState> collection of the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Application%2A> object and copies it to a new object variable.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir retorna um objeto chamado MyAppVar1 do <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState>coleção de intrínseca <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Application%2A>do objeto e o copia para uma nova variável de objeto.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Application%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState>

source.ph: ```vb# Dim MyObject As Object MyObject = Application.Get("MyAppVar1") ```

target.ph: ```vb# Dim MyObject As Object MyObject = Application.Get("MyAppVar1") ```

trans-unit.source: The name of the object.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The object referenced by name.
trans-unit.target: O objeto referenciado por name .

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object name by index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> nome do objeto por índice.

trans-unit.source: The index of the application state object.
trans-unit.target: O índice do objeto de estado do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The name under which the application state object was saved.
trans-unit.target: O nome sob a qual o objeto de estado do aplicativo foi salvo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a single <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object by index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um único <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objeto por índice.

trans-unit.source: The numerical index of the object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice numérico do objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object referenced by index.
trans-unit.target: O objeto referenciado por index .

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of a single <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object by name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de um único <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objeto pelo nome.

trans-unit.source: The name of the object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The object referenced by name.
trans-unit.target: O objeto referenciado por name .

trans-unit.source: Locks access to an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> variable to facilitate access synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Bloqueia o acesso a um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> variável para facilitar a sincronização de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState> class performs automatic locking and unlocking with the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.AllKeys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Count%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Get%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.GetKey%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.RemoveAt%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Set%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState>classe executa automático de bloqueio e desbloqueio com a <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.AllKeys%2A>e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Count%2A>Propriedades e o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Get%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.GetKey%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.RemoveAt%2A>e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Set%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Set%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.GetKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Get%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.AllKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState>

trans-unit.source: However, explicitly using the Lock and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.UnLock%2A> methods when you have a series of operations may be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, usar explicitamente o bloqueio e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.UnLock%2A>métodos quando você tem uma série de operações podem ser mais eficientes.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.UnLock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Removes the named object from an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o objeto nomeado de um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to be removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes all objects from an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os objetos de um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: RemoveAll is an internal call to <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: RemoveAll é uma chamada interna para <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A>.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Removes an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object from a collection by index.
trans-unit.target: Remove um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objeto de uma coleção por índice.

trans-unit.source: The position in the collection of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: A posição na coleção do item a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Updates the value of an object in an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o valor de um objeto em um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the object to be updated.
trans-unit.target: O nome do objeto a ser atualizado.

trans-unit.source: The updated value of the object.
trans-unit.target: O valor atualizado do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets all objects declared by an <xref uid="langword_csharp_<object>" name="<object>" href=""></xref> tag where the scope is set to "Application" within the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os objetos declarados por um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<object>" name="<object>" href=""> </xref> marca onde o escopo é definido como "Application" dentro do aplicativo ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Application objects are defined in the Global.asax file inside the `<object runat="server" scope="Application"> </object>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Objetos de aplicativo são definidos no arquivo global asax dentro de `<object runat="server" scope="Application"> </object>` marcas.

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects on the page.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos na página.

trans-unit.source: Unlocks access to an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> variable to facilitate access synchronization.
trans-unit.target: Desbloqueia o acesso a um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> variável para facilitar a sincronização de acesso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState> class performs automatic locking and unlocking with the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.AllKeys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Count%2A> properties and the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Get%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.GetKey%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.RemoveAt%2A> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Set%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState>classe executa automático de bloqueio e desbloqueio com a <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.AllKeys%2A>e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Count%2A>Propriedades e o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Get%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.GetKey%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.RemoveAt%2A>e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Set%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Set%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.GetKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Get%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.AllKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState>

trans-unit.source: However, explicitly using the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Lock%2A> and UnLock methods when you have a series of operations may be more efficient.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, explicitamente usando o <xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Lock%2A>e métodos de desbloqueio quando você tem uma série de operações podem ser mais eficientes.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplicationState.Lock%2A>
